.. api_tools:

=========================
Tools *(autoclean.tools)*
=========================

.. currentmodule:: autoclean.tools

Available Tools
-------------------

This section covers the utility tools that provide additional functionality for EEG data processing in AutoClean.

AutoClean Review GUI
--------------------
The AutoClean Review GUI is a graphical user interface tool that allows researchers to review and manually edit the results of automated EEG processing. It provides an interactive environment for visualizing EEG data, inspecting processing results, and making manual adjustments when necessary. This tool is particularly useful for quality control and fine-tuning the automated processing outcomes.
